EmailTemplate.name: Rejection Email_PSP
EmailTemplate.subject: PSP Portal new account request denied
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your new account request for the Produce Safety Program (PSP) Portal has been denied. Look for a follow-up email on how to proceed. If an email is not received within 24 hours, you can contact PSP Admin staff at psp@cdfa.ca.gov .
Thank you,
PSP Administrator
Inspection Services Division
California Department of Food and Agriculture
